work_xp.name: Embedded Systems Class
work_xp.description: Answering student questions throughout in-class lab, and carrying out 'checkoffs' with students, holding discussions that verify that they understand lab material.

work_xp.name: Passive Measurement of Video Conferencing Quality
work_xp.description: Investigating the impact that different network factors have on video calling quality, like intermittent packet loss & lower bandwidth.

work_xp.name: Engineering Design Workshop
work_xp.description: Lead mentor and coordinator for 4 innovative high school engineering workshops held in Houston, San Francisco, Miami, and New Orleans. Each month-long workshop had 6-12 participants who worked in small teams on self-selected projects.
